Title: Perspective - Easy 2D and 3D programming with WPF
Description: Perspective is an experimental and pedagogical .NET class library for 2D and 3D WPF
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Perspective is an experimental and pedagogical .NET class library for 2D and 3D WPF

NEW : 3D layout system !



Lastest major version : Perspective 2.2 for WPF 4.0 & 4.5 - see Source code for releases

Documentation :
  • WPF and Perspective general articles
  • WPF and Perspective 3D articles
    • For a general introduction on 3D with Perspective, you can read Perspective : easy 3D programming with WPF.
  • A reference documentation is included in the source files (XmlDoc comments).
For older framework versions, see Perspective 1.0 for .NET 3.5 & .NET 3.5 SP1.

Enjoy !
